Package hu.bme.mit.theta.solver

Interface ItpSolver

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, SolverBase
All Known Implementing Classes:
CVC5SmtLibItpSolver, ItpSolverValidatorWrapper, MathSATSmtLibItpSolver, PrincessSmtLibItpSolver, SMTInterpolSmtLibItpSolver, SmtLibItpSolver, Z3NewSmtLibItpSolver, Z3OldSmtLibItpSolver
public interface ItpSolver extends SolverBase
An extension of the Solver interface, which also supports interpolation. It can create ItpMarkers, and expressions can be added to these markers. The markers can form different ItpPatterns, e.g., binary or sequence. First, the expressions have to be checked with SolverBase.check(). Then if the expressions are unsatisfiable, an interpolant can be calculated with getInterpolant(ItpPattern).
